title: Strengthening AI Practical Competencies: Computer-Based Mathematical Literacy Strategies for Critical Literacy Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Mathematical Concepts, Experience in Text Analysis
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can select and apply more than three metacognitive strategies appropriately when analyzing mathematical texts.
Learners can identify logical structures of complex mathematical documents with 80% accuracy and pinpoint core arguments.
Learners can evaluate peers' text analysis results based on a 3-level evaluation criteria using peer feedback.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
